title: This app creates voiceover audio that sounds like a human. And right now, it’s an extra 20% off at just $47.99.
content:
Macworld

Most content creators are true multihyphenates, writing copy, shooting and editing video, distributing items across social platforms, and more. But there are some tasks that even these real jack-of-all-trades can have a hard time completing on their own. Like delivering a confident, vocally pleasing voiceover on their video projects.

Thankfully, artificial intelligence can now shoulder that load instead, and a lifetime subscription to Micmonster AI Voiceovers can make sure audio presentations always sound 100% professional and accomplished. Save an extra 20 percent with code ENJOY20 through March 10th only. 

Powered by AI, Micmonster allows users to choose from over 600 different voices to generate life-like voiceover content for inclusion in any web-based audio and video content. Creators just entire the text, select the right voice, then Micmonster creates a tone-perfect vocal track ready for editing.

Micmonster allows for full customization, including adjusting vocal inflections, and accents, or even producing audio tracks in any of 140 different languages.

But unlike many similar AI voice generators, Micmonster audio is often indistinguishable from the real thing, delivering audio that sounds as natural as if it was recorded by a real, living, breathing human.
